reviewtext: After I changed the Midland 18-2424 antenna from a PL-249 plug to a BNC plug with an inexpensive Radio Shack adapter, I plugged in, turned on and started receiving chatter from miles away. Haven't figured out the greatest possible distances yet but I have not had any trouble picking up more talk than I can listen to. Transmits well - have not had a problem speaking to truckers from my car. Love it!
